message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $14,000. I think it would be very valuable to you, and this is a fair price.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,000. I'm willing to pay that price for it.
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  However, $11,000 is quite a bit below my minimum. Could you do $13,000? I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations.
I'm still not sure I can go as high as $13,000. How about $12,200? I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I really need to stay within my budget.
